title: Preseason to season 7 hextech items
body: So i just recently lost almost all of my materials in my hextech crafting inventory (Items included championship shards, project cores, project blueprints, and project zed skin shard), I read that warnings were given about this although i did not see any. Is there anything else i will lose from my inventory when the season starts/ preseason ends?

replies.body: Only project disruption and worlds materials/ingredients were expired.  There aren't any other events currently with hextech crafting so you should be fine!  Hope that helps bring some ease.
